id.description: The unique identifier for the charter signature

group.description: ID of the group whose charter is being signed

user.description: ID of the user who signed the charter

charterHash.description: Hash of the charter content to track versions and prevent replay attacks

signature.description: Cryptographic signature proving the user's agreement to the charter

publicKey.description: User's public key for signature verification

message.description: Original message that was signed (usually contains charter details)

updatedAt.description: When the signature was last updated
